text: Leimiswil was a municipality in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, Kleindietwil and Leimiswil were merged with the municipality of Madiswil.Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == Category:Former municipalities in Oberaargau
